function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Over-emphasis on technology and biomedical expertise","Impact":"Neglect of needs and capacities of vulnerable population groups and local stakeholders","Mitigation":"Incorporate the importance of community participation, citizen engagement, and social differentiation in VBD control","Technologies":"Community-based approaches, citizen engagement platforms","People":"Vulnerable population groups, local stakeholders","Owner":"Global health organizations, local health authorities"},{"Description":"Underdeveloped thematic areas for VBDs: community participation, citizen engagement, social differentiation, and wider system dynamics","Impact":"Ineffective control of VBDs and failure to address the needs of vulnerable populations","Mitigation":"Promote the importance of community participation, citizen engagement, and social differentiation in VBD control","Technologies":"Community engagement tools, social differentiation analysis tools","People":"Vulnerable population groups, local stakeholders","Owner":"Global health organizations, local health authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of consideration for vulnerability, resilience, adaption, and community-based approaches","Impact":"Inefficient allocation of funding and resources for VBD control","Mitigation":"Guide funding and prioritization efforts based on concepts of vulnerability, resilience, and community-based approaches","Technologies":"Vulnerability assessment tools, resilience measurement tools","People":"Funders, policymakers, global health organizations","Owner":"Policy and funding agencies"}]}
